title: Google Pixel shutdown at battery left 30%
content:
The Google Pixel I bought on July 2017 now is totally unreliable: when it is approaching 30% of battery charge, the phone will shut down, and it wont start anymore. I need to charge it for 15 minutes before it could just start. 
I am totally disappointed, i believe i bought the best phone ever, instead it is the MOST expensive phone i bought and it lasted less than any other phone I bought in the past.
Totally disappointed.
